byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: The daily deal site is preparing for an investor road show for its planned initial public offering, with a valuation sharply below initial expectations.
snippet: The daily deal site is preparing for an investor road show for its planned initial public offering, with a valuation sharply below initial expectations.

headline.main: Groupon May Value Itself in I.P.O. at Close to $12 Billion
